column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Everything was as it should be
column2: from the warm welcome by the hostesses to the fresh bread with steam still rising from the chewy center
column3: to smooth martinis and a perfectly fine steak. The ambiance of each floor is different
column4: with the upstairs playing jazz and swing
column5: and the downstairs playing more urban music (like nod your head
column6: relaxing in a lounge kind of beats). It's a pricy place
column7: but with every penny. I would change nothing about my experience.
